sense.gloss: inquiry (about a product, business deal, etc.), enquiry
being summoned to appear to court, witness
pulling against each other, pulling from both ends

sdata.j: あいつは↑海千山千↑↓うみせんやません↓だから、↑取↑↓と↓り↑引↑↓|ひ↓き↑相手↑↓あい|て↓としてはかなり↑手強↑↓てごわ↓いぞ。
sdata.e: All those tricks he's got up his sleeve make him a formidable client.

sdata.j: ↑他人↑↓たにん↓の↑悪事↑↓あくじ↓を↑引↑↓|ひ↓き↑合↑↓あ↓い|に↑出↑↓だ↓して↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑悪事↑↓あくじ↓の↑言↑↓い↓い↑訳↑↓わけ↓をすることはできない。
sdata.e: Two wrongs don't make a right.
